name: Samsung Galaxy S21
description: The Samsung Galaxy S21 is a powerful flagship smartphone with a stunning display and top-of-the-line features.

name: iPhone 12 Pro
description: The iPhone 12 Pro offers a seamless user experience with its advanced camera system and fast performance.

name: Google Pixel 6
description: The Google Pixel 6 features a superb camera, clean Android experience, and impressive AI capabilities.

name: OnePlus 9 Pro
description: The OnePlus 9 Pro delivers an exceptional display, fast charging, and a smooth user interface.

name: Xiaomi Mi 11 Ultra
description: The Xiaomi Mi 11 Ultra boasts a powerful camera system, a large display, and long-lasting battery life.

name: Sony Xperia 1 III
description: The Sony Xperia 1 III features a stunning 4K display, excellent camera capabilities, and robust performance.

name: LG Wing
description: The LG Wing offers a unique swivel design, dual screens, and versatile multitasking capabilities.

name: Motorola Edge Plus
description: The Motorola Edge Plus combines a powerful processor, a curved display, and a large battery for an excellent overall experience.

name: Huawei P40 Pro
description: The Huawei P40 Pro features a versatile camera system, a beautiful display, and impressive performance.

name: Oppo Find X3 Pro
description: The Oppo Find X3 Pro offers a vibrant display, powerful camera capabilities, and fast charging.
